name: Press Start to Warp
author: Avaro
info: An FFC script useful for title screens. Press start to warp.
description: An FFC script useful for title screens. Press start to warp.
setup: Put the FFC with the script on the screen. Set Side Warp A to warp where you want it to warp.Set the D-values as follows:D0: The time in frames to wait before the player can press start. (leave at 0 if not needed)D1: SFX for pressing start. (leave at 0 if not needed)D2: The time in frames to wait before warping after the player pressed start. (leave at 0 if not needed)D3: The combo ID of an invisible Auto Sidewarp A combo.D4: Set to 1 if you want the script to disable all button presses other than start.
